videoSnippet.title: What Happened to Karpov?
videoSnippet.description:
Follow Olimpiu Urcan here https://twitter.com/olimpiuurcan
https://capaproject.com/
Have a great day :)

Anatoly Karpov vs Boris Spassky
Interpolis 4th (1980), Tilburg NED, rd 9, Sep-29
Sicilian Defense: Scheveningen Variation. Keres Attack (B81)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cd4 4. Nd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 e6 6. g4 h6 7. h4 Nc6 8. Rg1 d5 9. Bb5 Bd7 10. ed5 Nd5 11. Nd5 ed5 12. Be3 Be7 13. Qd2 Bh4 14. O-O-O Bf6 15. Nf5 Bf5 16. gf5 a6 17. Bc6 bc6 18. Bc5 Rb8 19. b4 Rb5 20. Rge1 Kd7 21. c4 Rc5 22. bc5 Bg5 23. f4 Qf6 24. cd5 Qa1 25. Kc2 Qa2 26. Kd3 Qd2 27. Rd2 Bf4 28. Ra2 cd5 29. Ra6 h5 30. Kd4 h4 31. Kd5 Rb8 32. f6 gf6 33. Rf6 Bg3 34. Rf7 Kd8 35. Rf8

00:00 Hello Everyone!
01:20 Game Starts!
04:50 Completely New Game!
08:20 Pause the Video!
11:35 It Was in this position
13:25 Contributions
